title: Login Issues
body:
So at first the issue i had was  we're unable to log you in because you may be offline.
(which im not) 
i found a board that had something about changing a file to avoid this problem. Which did that but instead I got a new error which was Unable to connect to login queue, click here to check server status. and then something about clicking here to get to like the riot games support which that page wont even load either I get this:
support.riotgames.com’s server DNS address could not be found.
I restarted  my internet, my pc and flushed my DNS..
 {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}  
**help** pls

**EDIT**: 
Okay so i just found the main post, everyone had this problem about 3 days ago. (I didnt) and that apparently it was solved and mainly people with Telstra and something else, but 
1. this problem JUST happened to me now.
2. Im with TPG

replies.body: seems to be happening to me aswell (also with TPG)
yeah and now its happened again.. ugh
SAME HERE I GOT THIS PROBLEM TOO
Are you still having issues? I'm trying to login now with the same error message that popped up for me 3 days ago. It did resolve temporarily but now it's busted AGAIN!
